messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go
I don't think issue 4232 is the correct one to reference. Please fix the description, the rest looks fine. I'm guessing the next CL will remove net.IPNet from the code ?

PTAL

> I'm guessing the next CL will remove net.IPNet from the code ?

it's already done, this CL is a final piece.

Just noticed that Brad already said LGTM but its
destination address did not contain golang-dev.

On 2013/03/29 04:27:05, mikio wrote:
> PTAL
> 
> > I'm guessing the next CL will remove net.IPNet from the code ?
> 
> it's already done, this CL is a final piece.

Phones. How do they work?
